entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
